main event: Civilians reported observing a UFO in Annapolis, MD over 18 minutes, which was later identified as a weather balloon.
interesting points: The sighting occurred during a clear day with no clouds., The object was described as extremely bright and shiny with a possible red cast., The object was observed above a flight of four F-245 aircraft., The object reportedly exploded in a burst of white smoke and broke into two halves., The witnesses included five civilians from the local area.
sighted object: unidentified flying object (UFO) later concluded to be a weather balloon
witness description: five civilians in the Annapolis area
